name: Environmental association Za Zemiata
headAddress: Zapaden park 130, vh. B, floor 2, apt.6
membership: Za Zemiata is the Bulgarian member of the largest international network of environmental organisations, Friends of the Earth (www.foeeurope.org, www.foei.org). We are part of a number of issue-based national and international NGO networks including: CEE Bankwatch (http://bankwatch.org/), Climate Action Network â€“ Europe (www.climnet.org/), Global Alliance for Incineration Alternatives (www.no-burn.org), Zero Waste Europe (www.zerowasteeurope.eu) Climate Action Bulgaria Coalition (www.climatebg.org), For the Nature (www.forthenature.org), etc.
goal: Za Zemiata (ZZ) is an independent non-profit non-governmental organization established in 1995 to work for environmental justice and sustainable and equitable life on our planet, without exploitation of people or nature.
interests: Agriculture, Banking and financial services, Budget, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Za Zemiata promotes sustainable solutions in energy and climate, zero waste practices, food sovereignty and organic farming, air quality and urban environment, strategic use of public funds to drive environmental protection and long-term wellbeing for people and other species alike.
